2. Data sources indicate where the data used in this report are published. The publications will have the definitive data source

3. Data is presented for 150 of the 152 Upper Tier Local Authorities in England. Isles of Scilly and City of London have been excluded due to small sample numbers. For alcohol related admissions data; City of London has been combined with Hackney and Isles of Scilly has been combined with Cornwall; for Preventable Mortality Isles of Scilly has ben combined with Cornwall

Quality and methodology information reports measure the statistical quality of ONS outputs against the five European Statistics System (ESS) quality dimensions to ensure high standards across European countries. They also provide a summary of the methods used in generating these outputs as well as a list of recent publications. A quality and methodology report for Health State Life Expectancies was published in November 2016 and is available on the ONS website.
